synopsis.text: Strange occurrences unfold in the quaint town of Tomobiki as Lum and her friends embark on a filmmaking adventure, titling their project "Legends of the Oni Princess." With Lum in the lead role and Ataru on board to assist, the stage is set for a mix of mishaps and mystery. However, when Ataru chops down a venerable 300-year-old cherry tree, Tarozakura, the town's supernatural events escalate. Lum's powers start to wane, and her very existence appears to fade from the world's memory. As the friends grapple with their own identities and the town's peculiar happenings, they must uncover the truth behind the vanishing of Lum's powers and the sudden amnesia that plagues them all. Join the Tomobiki gang as they navigate this enigmatic journey in this captivating Urusei Yatsura film.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
